text: Illinois 12th congressional district is a congressional district in the state of Illinois. The district is in parts of Madison county, and all of Alexander, Franklin, Jackson, Jefferson, Monroe, Perry, Pulaski, Randolph, St. Clair, Union and Williamson counties.Illinois Congressional District 12 , Illinois Board of Elections The people who live in the district elect a person to work for the district in the United States House of Representatives. The district is currently represented by Republican Mike Bost. ==Election history== Election results from presidential races Year Office Results 2020 President Trump 56 - 41% 2016 President Trump 55 - 40% 2012 President Obama 50 - 48% 2008 President Obama 55 - 44% 2004 President Kerry 52 - 48% 2000 President Gore 53 - 44% ==References== 12
title: Illinois's 12th congressional district
